Aguaytia is a city in the
You can fly in on one of Peru's national airlines to the City of Pucallpa and then drive by bus or by Autotaxi, or, for the more adventurous, you could try coming in on a bus from
are odd, motor-tricycle taxis that are the standard mode of transportation for Aguaytia.

There is not very much in the way of sightseeing in Aguaytia itself.  That said, most attractions are water related and few miles towards Tingo Maria you can find the famous waterfall "Velo de la Novia" which is a nice place for a day trip.
